subtitle: where is compassion most needed when is
it most begging to be worked on at home
or in the subjects that hit closest to
home today is day 38 compassion in
bonding compassionate bonding or healthy
attachment is an invitation to bring
more balance integrity and consideration
into our personal relationships or the
projects with which we engage
both compassion and bonding are already
blenders that take into consideration
two opposite realities
the desire to give the understanding
that we have what to receive
the desire to create the understanding
that we need to cooperate the desire to
forge forward the understanding that
with humility and patience we need to
create pause and space for others
so today
using compassion in bonding bring
compassion home where it matters most
